channel.title: Help please
channel.description: i need to find out how to change the buy/sell from the shop to a higher amount or an x amount? and how would i make it so when ur wearing a certain item, it changes your XP_MODIFIER?

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @MsSummer MsSummer
item.description:
@MsSummer wrote:

thanks. and that can go up to as many times as i want as xp wise? like 5x the xp? and what if i wanted to make it a glove instead? make it c.playerglove? and this is a 639 quantum, dementhium. I don’t see a prices.txt

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

MsSummer:

i need to find out how to change the buy/sell from the shop to a higher amount or an x amount? and how would i make it so when ur wearing a certain item, it changes your XP_MODIFIER?

To increase the price’s go to prices.txt and as for the item that modifies exp, you can always make a double exp ring…

Under AddSkillXP in PlayerAssistant search for

Replace with this

amount *= Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS; if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] == ####) //your ring ID here amount *= 2;

Obviously replace #### with your ring ID.
Have fun.

Read full topic
